title: MindScribe
description: A dual-mode application for voice dictation and prompt optimization. Record your thoughts, get instant AI transcription, and transform raw recordings into polished notes in multiple styles - all powered by Google Gemini.

modes.name: Notes Mode
modes.description: Voice-first note creation with AI-powered transcription and enhancement
features: Live audio recording with waveform visualization
Multi-style Polish (Formal, Casual, Meeting Minutes, Email, Poem)
AI Insights with executive summaries and action items

modes.name: Prompter Mode
modes.description: Voice-powered prompt crafting and optimization interface

voiceEnhancement.name: Voice Enhancement Pipeline
voiceEnhancement.description: From raw audio to polished content in seconds. Gemini transcribes your voice recordings and can transform them into multiple formats based on your needs.

polishStyles.name: Formal
polishStyles.description: Professional tone suitable for business documents

polishStyles.name: Meeting Minutes
polishStyles.description: Structured format with attendees, decisions, action items

widgetMode.name: Widget Mode
widgetMode.description: Standalone floating window for quick prompt generation. Access via ?mode=widget parameter for a focused, distraction-free prompter interface.
widgetMode.useCase: Quick prompt optimization without leaving your current workflow

roadmap: Export to various formats (PDF, Notion, etc.)
